document_name: Annex 1 Report on Budgeting in Montenegro.pdf
Strengthening mechanisms for public finance at the local level in Montenegro ProDocFINAL.pdf

outputs.output_descr: With the overall objective to support municipalities (particularly in the northern part of Montenegro) to increase capacities in the area of organizational and leadership development, this project is essentially comprised of three main components: further development of (1) inter-municipal cooperation (IMC); (2) Municipal Assemblies in Montenegro and (3) Support the implementation of capacity building programmes in line with the National Training Strategy (NTS) under the IPA 2010 Project "Support to Local Self-Government for implementation of the NTS and provision of grants to municipalities"

The Project is designed to support development of capacities of the municipal stakeholders and stakeholders at the central level to introduce transparent, accountable, results oriented budgeting reflecting capital investments, local and national strategic priorities.
